      • createFragments

        public <T> List<T> createFragments(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader,
                                   int docId,
                                   String fieldName,
                                   org.apache.lucene.search.vectorhighlight.FieldFragList fieldFragList,
                                   int maxNumFragments,
                                   ObjectEncoder<T> encoder)
                            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ObjectFragmentsBuilder
        create multiple fragments.
        Specified by:
        createFragments in interface ObjectFragmentsBuilder
        Parameters:
        reader - IndexReader of the index
        docId - document id to be highlighter
        fieldName - field of the document to be highlighted
        fieldFragList - FieldFragList object
        maxNumFragments - maximum number of fragments
        encoder - an encoder that generates encoded text
        Returns:
        created fragments or null when no fragments created. size of the array can be less than maxNumFragments
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a low-level I/O error
